Create Color Mapping for Bar Plots

Source: R/wp_plot_bar.r
in_create_color_mapping.Rd

Internal function that creates color mappings for bar plots. Handles both standard schemes and custom groupings.

Used by: in_plot_one_indic_bar, in_plot_multi_indic_bar Uses: in_get_color_group, in_get_category_labels, in_get_color_palettes

Features:

  • Color assignment by group

  • Dark color variants for statistics

  • Group labeling

  • "Other" category handling

Usage

in_create_color_mapping(data, color, base_size = 16)

Developed by Benjamin Peeters.
